Hi

As i have a lot of mods installed i would like to have one button in the stock toolbar who is able to remove the other not needed buttions from various mod configs so the stock menu gets cleaned up. 

This "cleaner" button should be visible and maybe subgroup the buttons like blizzys toolbar, so i can acces them if needed but otherwise hides them....

Is there something out there similar to this ?

Thank

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T10:13:02Z" title="04/29/2015 10:13  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by ManuxKerb**

Hello, this function is on [QuickHide](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/95168#QuickHide), but I haven't finish the update to KSP 1.00 which will have a new function, better integrated ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I will updated it this week ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
